name: looper - Arrow Twist Hit
description:
Each touch begins a new rhythm of colors that travels through increasingly complex constellations. If you make mistakes with the times, the rhythms could collide and burn. But, if you do it well, you will enjoy the simple satisfaction of a harmony in repetition.

Highlights Looper Hit:

-Easy to play for all ages.
-It's a musical puzzle game
-Puzzle and brain in the game.
